src: O tladitse a re, jaanong re na le dipeba tsa dikgwedi tse 4, tse di senang bolwetse jwa sukiri mme di kile tsa bo di na le jone.
mt: 4 days later, the body was found, with no signs of foul play.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, morutuntshi wa tsa bongaka kwa Yunibesiting ya Dalhousie kwa Halifax, Nova Scotia, yo gape e leng modulasetilo lekalana la tsa kalafi le maranyane la Mokgatlho wa Canada wa Bolwetse jwa Sukiri, o tsibositse go re dipatlisiso tse di sentse e le gone di simolodisiwang.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a member of the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, said the new technology could revolutionize the way we diagnose and treat disease.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Jaaka bangwe ba baitseanape, o na le dipelaelo tsa go re a bolwetse jwa sukiri bo a alafega, go sa lebalwe go re diphitlhelelo tseno ga di amane ka gope le batho ba ba nang le sukiri ya Type 1.
mt: As with other patients, he has Type 1 diabetes, which is not associated with obesity.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Ka Mosupologo, Sara Danius, mokwaledi-mogolo wa Komiti ya Nobel ya Sekgele sa tsa Bokwadi kwa Swedish Academy, o phatlaladitse mo thulaganyong ya seromamowa mo Sveriges Radio kwa Sweden go re komiti e itlhobogile ka maiteko a go itshwaraganya le Bob Dylan, mabapi le go bo a gapile Sekgele sa Bokwadi sa 2016, ka ba nna ba palalwa ke go mo fitlhelela.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, told Swedish Radio that the committee had decided to award the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature to Bob Dylan, after the academy had been criticized for not having announced the winner.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius o rile, ”Mo nakong ya gompieno ga re dire sepe. Ke leditse ke be ke romela melaetsa ya e-mail ko go ba ba dirisanang thata le ene ka bo ke amogela diphetolo tse di solofetsang. Ga jaana se se selekane.”
mt: “I don’t know what to say. I’m shocked that I received this e-mail from him. I never thought it would happen.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Mo nakong e e fetileng, mookamedi wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, o ne a tshwaela fa kompone e simolodisitswe fa tshitswana e e kokotang ya lebentlele e ne e sa utlwale fa a le ko mabeelong a dikoloi.
mt: In the past, Ring co-founder Jamie Siminoff had said the company was working on a device that would be "a lot cheaper" than the Nest.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: A re o dirile tshitswana e e kokotang ya WiFi.
mt: It can be made to be WiFi enabled.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: O ne a oketsa ka gore ”mme gone ga ba a tshwanela go kopiwa go tsaya maikarabelo a a fetang seemo sa bone sa kgolo, maikarabelo le bokgoni.”
mt: He said, "and the airport is not equipped to handle large aircraft, helicopters or large crowds."
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Go ya kwa bofelong jwa ngwaga wa 2017, Siminoff o ne a tlhagelela mo thelebishening ya tsa theko mo chaneleng ya QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was inducted into the Consumer Electronics Hall of Fame.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring e ne gape, ya duela kompone e e phadisanyang le yone ya tsa itshireletso, ADT Corporation, e e neng e e sekisitse ka fa molaong.
mt: The company, ADT Corporation, which makes the alarm system, was also sued.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Le fa molemo o o lekelediwang o bonala o kgona go fokotsa Ebola, go fitlha gompieno, ga gona melemo epe e e bonalang e kgona go fodisa mogare o.
mt: A vaccine is available, but there is no cure for Ebola.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Molemo mongwe, ZMapp o ne o solofetsa fa o dirisiwa, dipatlisiso tse di tseneletseng di ne tsa supa fa o sa thuse thata mo ke thibeleng loso.
mt: One of the patients, ZMapp, was reported to have recovered after receiving the experimental treatment.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Mo tshekatshekong ya PALM, ZMapp e ne e le one molemo o o neng o dirisiwa go tshwantshanya boleng ja melemo e meraro e mengwe.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was one of three experimental treatments given to patients.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Lekgotla la USA Gymnastics le dumalana le lekwalo la Komiti ya Di-Olimpiki ya Amerika e bo e dumelana le botlhokwa jwa go re botlhe ba ba amanang le di-Olimpiki go rotloetsa tikologo e e sireletsegileng ya batshameki botlhe.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the U.S. Olympic Committee are both investigating allegations of sexual abuse by a former team doctor.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Re dumalana le polelo ya USOC ya go re dikgatlhego tsa batshameki le ditlhopha tsa rona, le metshameko ya bone, di ka direlwa botoka ke go gatela pele ka phetogo e e maleba mo teng ga mokgatlho wa rona, go na le go tsaya setifikeiti.
mt: We are in discussions with the USOC regarding our athletes and their support staff, and the timing of our team's arrival, including the possibility of an early arrival.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Ba sethopha sa USA Gymnastics ba rotloetsa go re go nne le patlisiso e e ikemetseng, e e tla senolang go re kgokgontsho e e kanakana e batswa-setlhabelo ba ga Larry Nassar ba e begileng ka bopelokgale, go tsile jang go re e bo e nnile sebaka se se kana e sa lemogwe; e bile e rotloetsa diphetogo tse di maleba tse di ka tlhokafalang.
mt: USA Gymnastics officials say they are aware of the investigation, which is expected to determine whether the organization knew about Nassar's abuse and failed to protect its athletes; it also is looking into whether the organization mishandled allegations against the doctor.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: O ne a dumela ntlha ya gore o ne a tsamaisa diritibatsi, a dira maeto a le mmalwa go ralala Australia.
mt: He admitted to having sent threatening emails, and making threats to blow up Australia.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Mo dingwageng tsa bo-1960, Brzezinski o ne a direla John F. Kennedy jaaka mogakolodi wa gagwe, mme morago, a direla le botsamaisi jwa ga Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy, and later, to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Ka ditlhopho tsa 1976 o ne a gakolola Carter ka tsa ditirisanyo le mafatshe a sele, a bo a nna National Security Advisor (NSA) go tswa mo go 1977 go fithela 1981, a tlhatlhama Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 saw Carter's election to the presidency, following a campaign that focused on human rights and the need to end the war in Vietnam, and his appointment as National Security Advisor (NSA) in 1977 until 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Jaaka NSA, o thusitse Carter ka botsipa ja tsamaiso ya go rarabolola dikgang tsa mafatshe, jaaka ya Camp David Accords, ka 1978; go busetsa mo maemong a a siameng tirisano-mmogo magareng ga mafatshe a US le China mo bofelong ja dingwaga tsa bo 1970; tsogolego puso ya Iran e e bakileng go re Iran e tsene mo seemong se sa iketlang sa go thupiwa ga batho ka 1979; le go tlhaselwa ga lefatshe la Afghanistan ke ba Soviet ka 1979.
mt: 1978: Carter signs SALT II arms control treaty with Soviet Union; 1978: Camp David Accords signed between Israel and Egypt; 1979: US and China establish diplomatic relations; 1979: Iranian revolution ousts Shah; 1979: Soviet Union invades Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Motshameko wa motshikinyego o mo go one go tlhagelelang Ryan Gosling le Emma Stone, o amogetse ditlhopho mo dikarolong tsotlhe tse di tona.
mt: 2017 Oscar nominees Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone are among the most popular actors in the world.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling le Stone ba tlhophilwe go ya makgalokgannyeng a go phadisanyetsa sekgele sa Modiragatsi yo o Gaisang, wa monna, le wa mosadi, ka tatelano.
mt: Gosling and Stone were found guilty of incest, a man and a woman, by a jury.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Bangwe ba ba tlhophilweng ba akaretsa Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing le Oroginal Screenplay.
mt: 12 nominations for Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dipina tse pedi go tswa mo setshwantshong sa motshikinyego, sa Audition (The Fools Who Dream) le sa City of Stars, di bone ditlhopho tsa pina e e gaisitseng e e itlhametsweng. Lefelo la bodiragatsi la Lionsgate le bone ditlhopho tse 26 - go gaisa mafelo a bodiragatsi a mangwe.
mt: 2 songs from the soundtrack, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, won the Best Original Song award. Lionsgate won 26 awards - the most for any studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Mo phirimaneng ya letsatsi la Tshipi, tautona wa lefatshe la United States, Donald Trump mo pegong e ntshitsweng ke mokwaledi wa bobegadikgang, a itse fa masole a US a tla tswa kwa Syria.
mt: In a speech to the nation on Sunday, President Donald Trump, who was briefed on the attack by his national security team, said U.S. forces would be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Kitsiso e dirilwe morago ga dipuisano ka mogala magareng ga ga Trump le tautona wa lefatshe la Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: The meeting was held after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Mo godimo ga moo, Turkey e tla tsaya maikarabelo a tlhokomelo ya batshwarwa ba batlhabani ba ISIS, ba pego e tlhalosang go re mafatshe a Yuropa a ganneng go ba busetsa gae.
mt: In addition, Turkey will take in up to 10,000 Syrian refugees, according to the UN, who have been displaced by the fighting in Syria.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Se ga se supe fela go re, le fa e se mo go kalo, dikgogomodumo dingwe di ne di na le diphuka, e le tumelo e e setseng e aname, mme se fa tlhaloso e masalela a ditshidi tse di suleng bogologolo, go le ga ntsi e se nang tsone, jaaka mmala le dipopego tsa tsone.
mt: It is not known if there were any other injuries, but the plane was on fire when it was found, and the bodies were badly burned, according to the officials.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Baitsaanape ba tsa boranyane ba re diphuka tsa phologolo e, di ne di le bosetlha fa godimo, ko tlase di le borobenyana.
mt: The researchers say the new method is faster and cheaper than current methods, which are time-consuming and expensive.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Diphitlhelelo tse gape, di fa tshedimosetso ka ga diphuka tsa dinonyane di fetogileng ka teng mo tsamaong ya nako.
mt: Other reports, including one from the Thai military, said the crash was caused by bad weather.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ka gonne diphuka tsa dinosaur di sena dithupana tse di itekanetseng, tse di bidiwang di rachis, mme di na le dipopego tse dingwe tsa diphuka – dintlhana le maodinyana – ba batlisisi ba swetsa ka gore di rachis ka tota e ne ele ditlhabologo tsa se gompieno gona le dipopego tse dingwe.
mt: As the dinosaurs' bones were broken, some of them were also crushed – the ribs and other bones – and the researchers say the bones were crushed by the weight of the body.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Ka fa diphuka tse di bopegileng ka teng, go kaa go re di ne di sa dirisediwe go fofa, mme di ne di dirisediwa go laola mogote le botsididi ja mmele, kana go bonwa. Babatlisisi bo ne ba re, le fa se e le mogatla wa kgogomodumo e nnye, sesupisiwa sone se supa diphuka tsa e tona e seng diphuka tsa kokwana.
mt: The reports of the crash were confirmed, but the plane was not damaged, and the only injuries were to the pilot's pride. The researchers said that, while the plane was a prototype, the crash was not a prototype crash.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Babatlisisi bo ne ba re, le fa se e le mogatla wa kgogomodumo e nnye, sesupisiwa sone se supa e le diphuka tsa e tona mme e seng diphuka tsa kokwana.
mt: The researchers say the device is cheap, and can detect both the presence of a disease and its severity.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomo ya koloi e e neng e beilwe kwa kantorong kgolo ya mapodise kwa Gaziantep, Turkey, maabane mo mosong e ne ya bolaya mapodise a le mabedi mme ya gobatsa batho ba feta masome a mabedi.
mt: 12 people were killed and 50 injured in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ba ofisi ya boeteledipele ba re mo go ba le lesome le borobabongwe ja ba ba gobetseng e ne e le mapodisi.
mt: Officials say the airport was closed for about 90 minutes.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Mapodisi a re ba belaela go re tlhaselo e dirilwe ke bangwe ba go tweng ke masole a Daesh (ISIL).
mt: The group said it was responsible for the attack, which it said was carried out by "soldiers of the caliphate."
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Ba lemogile go re letsatsi le bereka go tshwana dinaledi tse dingwe: Tiro ya dinaledi tsotlhe mo loaping go lemogilwe go re e dirwa ke ka fa di ntshang lesedi ka teng le go dikologa fela.
mt: The night sky is a great place to spend some time: The light pollution that makes the stars hard to see is also what makes the sky glow.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Go phatsima le go dikologa di dirisiwa mmogo thata go bona palo ya naledi ya Rossby, e e tsamaelanang le go elela ga polasema.
mt: The discovery of the Rossby gyre, which is responsible for the Gulf Stream, was made by Carl-Gustaf Rossby.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Fa nomoro ya Rossby e le nnye, go supa go re naledi e a bo e se na phapaano di-magnetic poles e e kwa godimo.
mt: As the number of Rossby waves increases, the poles are said to be moving closer together.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki ka nako ya loeto o tsene mo mathateng gapetsa kgapetsa.
mt: Iwasaki was killed in a car accident.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: O ne a utswelwa ke dilalome, a tlhaselwa ke ntsa e e nang le molafu ko Tibet, a falola nyalo ko Nepal a bo a tshwarwa ke ba sepodise ko India.
mt: He was arrested by police, detained in a Tibetan prison, and then released to a monastery in Nepal before being arrested by Indian police.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Seelo sa 802.11n se bereka mo mafaratlhatlheng a lobelo la 2.4Ghz le la 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n works in both the 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Se se e letla go re e kgone go dirisanya le tse di dirilweng pele tsa 802.11a, 802.11b le 802.11g - mme go laolwa fela ke go re go dirisiwa mafaratlhatlha a dual radios.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are supported, but only one radio can be active at a time.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Mabelo a 802.11n a feta a tsa pele go menagane, ka kekelo ya 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are faster than previous standards, with a maximum of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, yo a nyetseng e bile a na le bana ba ba bedi ba ba godileng, ga aka a tlogela dikakanyo tse di kgatlhang go Miller, yo e leng ene yo begetsweng kgang.
mt: Duvall, who has four children, refused to accept the settlement offer, which Miller's lawyers said was the best they could do.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Fa a kopiwa tshwaelo, Miller o rile, "Mike o bua thata mo tshekong... Ke ne ke sentse ke ipaakanya, ke jalo tota ga ke a utlwa se a neng a se bua."
mt: When asked about the incident, Miller said, "Mike was talking a lot in the car... I was just listening, I guess, because I didn't hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Hu o buile a re "Re itlama go fokotsa selekanyo carbon dioxide e etsanang mo moweng ka palo e e bonalang go simolola ka 2020 go tswa mo dipalong tsa 2005.
mt: "We are calling for the elimination of carbon dioxide emissions by 2020 from the levels of 2005.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: O ne a se ke a bua selekanyo sa go re ba tla kgaola ka bokae, a bua fela go ra selekanyo sa teng se tla laolwa ke mabaka a itsholelo a lefatshe la Chaena.
mt: He said the airport would be closed for a day or two, but only for the removal of debris, and that the runway would be reopened as soon as possible, according to Chinese media reports.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu o ile a rotloetsa dinaga tse di santseng di tlhabologa "go emisa mokgwa wa bogologolo wa go kgotlhela pele mme go phepafadiwe morago."
mt: "It is important to remember that the first priority is to save lives and not to be concerned about the cost of the operation."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: O ne a oketsa ka go re "mme gone ga ba a tshwanela go kopiwa go tsaya maikarabelo a a fetang seemo sa bone sa kgolo, maikarabelo le bokgoni."
mt: "I am not sure if I can be forgiven for the loss of life, property and livelihoods," he said.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Setlhopha sa dithutiso sa kwa Iraq se tlhagisitse pegelo ya sone ka 12:00 GMT gompieno.
mt: 12:00 GMT is 7:00 am local time.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: E tlhagisa go re ga go ope yo o ka tlhomamisang go re go na le sepe se se ka dirwang mo nakong ya gompieno se se ka emisang dintwa tsa tumelo le tlhakatlhakano.
mt: It is reported that the plane was not carrying any passengers and was on a training mission.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Pego e similoga ka kopo ya dipuisano go batla tumalano mo lefatsheng la Amerika ka maikemisetso a lone go mafatshe a kwa Botlhaba-gare.
mt: The report is similar to a recent U.S. government study that found that the U.S. government was not doing enough to protect the country from a possible attack.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Pego e e tshwaya phoso thata bontsi ja dikarolotsa maitlamo a gompieno a Bookamedi, a a itebagantseng le Iraq mme e rotloetsa phetogo ya se ka bofefo.
mt: A new book, The Iraq War: The Military and Political Impact, is being released by Praeger Security International, a division of ABC-CLIO, and is available for pre-order.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Mo megopolong e 78 ya bone, wa ntlha ke go re go simololwe motlhale o mongwe wa dipuisanyo pele ngwaga o o wela, go sireletsa melolwane ya Iraq kgatlhanong le ba ba botlhabetsi, le go simolodisa gape dipapadisanyo gareng ga lefatshe la Iraq le mafatshe a a mabapi.
mt: 78 people were killed, including one U.S. soldier, in a series of attacks in Iraq, including a car bomb targeting a U.S. convoy and a suicide attack on an Iraqi police station.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Modulasetilo wa ga jaana le mohumagadi wa ntlha wa ga tautona wa Argentina, Christina Fernandez de Kirchner, o tlhalositse keletso ya gagwe ya go emela ditlhopho tsa botautona maabane maitseboa kwa La Plata, toropo e e sekgele sa dikhilomithara di le 50 (dimaele tse 31) go tswa kwa Buenos Aires.
mt: 50 miles (80 km) south of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mohumagadi Kirchner o itsisitse ka maikaelelo a gagwe a go emela maemo a bo tautona kwa lefelo la bodiragatsi la Argentine, e bong lefelo le a le dirisitseng go simolola ipapatso ya gagwe ka 2005, go nna leloko la Senate, e le moemedi wa porofense ya Buenos Aires.
mt: First Lady Kirchner criticized the government's handling of the 2005 conflict with Britain over the Falkland Islands, which are claimed by Argentina, in a speech to the Senate, which is located in the capital Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Ngangisanyo e, e simolotswe ke dipuisano tsa ka fa madi a go thusa ba ba amilweng ke setshuatshue sa Katrina a ka diriswang ka teng. Bangwe ba tsa madi ba teile dipuo tse ka go tshameka bare ke, ”Bush's New Orleans Deal.”
mt: 1,000,000 people are still without power, and the government is still trying to help those affected by Hurricane Katrina. Some people are angry at the government for not doing enough to help the victims, saying, "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kgakololo e e phuthulogileng e remeletse thata mo go matswela a borra dikonteraka go re e bonwe ke baagi ba Washington.
mt: The crash site is near the Washington Monument.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Batho ba feta sedikadike ba ne ba ya phitlhong kwa Roma.
mt: 100s of people gathered in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Batho ba ne ba tsile ba ne bale bantsi thata mo e leng go re go go sa kgonagale go re mongwe le mongwe a letlelelwe go ka tsena kwa phitlhong kwa St. Peter's Square.
mt: 100,000 people were estimated to have attended the event, with some saying they were unable to get close to the square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Go ne ga tsenngwa dithelebishene di le mmalwa tse di tona mo mafelong a a farologaneng mo Roma go dira go re batho ba kgone go leba moletlo.
mt: 2,000 police officers were deployed in Rome to ensure that people could attend the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Mo mafelong a le mantsi a Italy le jaaka lefatshe ka bophara, segolobogolo ko Poland, go ne ga dirwa se se tshwanang, se se neng sa lebiwa ke batho ba le bantsi.
mt: In Italy and other countries in Eastern Europe, the death toll is rising, with more than 100 people dead.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Bakwala-ditso ba kgadile melao ya pele ya FBI ya go remelela thata ditsompelo mo dikgetsing tse di se ng motlhofo go rarabololwa, bogolo jang dikgetsi tsa bogodu ja dikoloi, ka maikaelelo a go oketsa kelo ya katlego ya mokgatlho wa bone.
mt: FBI agents raided the offices of a company that makes a popular brand of coffee, as part of an investigation into the company's alleged use of a secret ingredient.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Phuthego kgolo e simolotse thotoetso lenaneo la go phutha madi la 2005, mme la tlhalosa go re FBI e tshwanetse go romela baemedi ba le lesome go lebelela ditshwantsho tsa maranyane tsa thobalono ya bagolo.
mt: 2005 was the deadliest year on record, and the FBI says it may have been the work of a serial killer.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robbin Uthappa o kgonne dira dinno tse di kwa godimo ka metabogo e le 70 mo motshamekong e le 41, a betsa bone ga 11 le borataro ga 2.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa scored 41 runs in 11 balls, including 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Motshameki wa kirikete wa maemo a mo gare, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, ba diragaditse sentle e bile ba dirile kgolagano go taboga tse di lekgolo.
mt: 2003 World Cup champions Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were dropped from the team, while the selectors met to discuss the future of the team.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mme, morago ga go latlhegelwa ke captain's wicket India ba dira di-run di le 36 fela, ba latlhegelwa ke di-wicket di le supa, go feleletse di-innings.
mt: 36 runs were scored before the captain's wicket fell, and the team was dismissed for 96.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Tautona wa U.S. George W. Bush o gorogile kwa Singapore mo mosong wa Ngwanaatsele a le 16, go simolola loeto la beke kwa Asia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Saturday, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: O ne a dumedisiwa ke mothusa Tonakgolo wa Singapore e leng Wong Kan Seng a bo a buisana le Tonakgolo ya Singapore e leng Lee Hsien Loong ka dikgang tsa kgwebo le borukhuthi.
mt: He was also criticized by Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong for his handling of the riots and the subsequent curfew.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Morago ga go ya go latlhegelwa ke ditlhopho, Bush o ile a bolelela babogedi ka katoloso ya papadisanyo kwa Asia.
mt: Before the vote, Bush told reporters that the resolution was a "strong statement" against China.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Tonakgolo, Rre Stephen Harper o dumetse go romela molawana wa ”Clean Air Act” wa puso kwa malokong otlhe a komiti go sekasekwa pele ga e balwa la bobedi; morago ga bokopano ja metsotso e le masome a mabedi le botlhano le moetapele wa NDP, Jack Layton, kwa PMO ka Labobedi.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper is expected to introduce the “Clean Air Act” to Parliament on Tuesday; after a marathon session of 18 hours and 30 minutes, NDP leader Jack Layton confronted the PMO on Monday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton o ile a kopa diphetogo di dirwe mo molawaneng wa go tlhokomela tikologo ka nako ya fa bane bana le kopano le PM, ba kopa ”go kwala sesha mo go tseneletseng” ga molawawana wa go tlhokomela tikologo.
mt: Layton asked for the meeting to be moved to a location where the children and PM could be seen.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Fa e sale mmuso o tsaya marapo a go thusa ka madi sepatela sa Mersey kwa Devonport, Tasmania, puso le mapalamente mangwe ba kgadile se, ba bua fa e le setshosa fela, ka jaana ba lebile ditlhopho tse di tla tshwarwang ka Ngwanatsele.
mt: The Australian Maritime Safety Authority said the ship was being towed to the Mersey River in Devonport, Tasmania, when it was struck by a small boat, which then capsized, leaving two people missing.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Mme Tonakgolo John Howard a re se ke go sireletsa fela ditheo tsa bookelo go re di se ka tsa isiwa kwa tlase ke puso ya Tasmania, ka go ntsha didikadike tse dingwe tse AUD$45.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the booklets were only for "general information" and were not intended to be used as a guide to the afterlife in Tasmania, where some people were charged up to AUD$45.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Go ya ka dikgang tsa sesheng, dipalo tsa selekanyo sa metsi a lewatle di kaile fa setsuatsue sa Tsunami se ne se dirilwe. Go ne go na le ditiragalo dingwe tsa Tsunami tse di ne ng di gatisitswe gaufi le Pago Pago le Niue.
mt: According to local reports, the tsunami warning was issued after a 7.9 magnitude earthquake struck 100 miles (160 km) west of Pago Pago, American Samoa. Tsunami waves were also reported in Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ga go a begiwa ditshenyegelo kana dikgobalo tse di tona kwa Tonga, le fa ntswa go nnile le kgaogo ya motlakase ka nakwana, e go begilweng e kganetse bagolwane ba Tonga go amogela tlhagiso ya tsunami e e ntshitsweng ke PTWC.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued for Tonga, despite a 7.0 magnitude earthquake on Wednesday, which could have caused a tsunami.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Dikolo di le lesome-le-bone kwa Hawaii tse di gaufi le lewatle di ne tsa tswalwa ka Laboraro, le fa ntswa tsiboso ya bodiphatsa e ne e boetswe morago.
mt: 17 people were killed in Hawaii on Labor Day, and a tornado was reported later.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Tautona ya U.S. George W. Bush o amogetse kitsiso.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush has been briefed.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Moanamisa mafoko wa ga Bush, Gordon Johndroe o rebotse maitlamo a Korea bokone "kgatelopele ya maikaelelo a go atlega go emisa tiriso ya dibetsa ke ba Korea peninsula."
mt: On Sunday, White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the United States was "deeply concerned" about North Korea's "provocative" missile test.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Dipula tsa matlakadibe tsa bolesome tse di filweng leina tsa paka ya sefefo sa Atlantic, dipula tsa matlakadibe tsa Jerry, di ile tsa diragala mo Lewatle la Atlantic gompieno.
mt: 2 Atlantic hurricanes, Jerry and Jerry, have been tracking across the Atlantic.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) ba re mo nako e Jerry ga e supe matshosetsi ape.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is not expected to strengthen further.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Mapodisi a di Engenere a U.S. ba lekanyeditse go re dikhilomithara tse 6 tsa pula di ka senya ditshenyegelo tsa pele.
mt: 6 inches of rain in the past 24 hours caused flooding.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Wate ya borobongwe, e e boneng merwalela e e bogodimo jwa dikgato dile 20 ka nako ya kgwanyape ya Katrina, ga jaana metsi a teng a a tsamaya go fitlha mo nokeng mo gonne maparego a a gaufi a ile a tlala phetelela.
mt: 20 feet of water flooded the first floor of the house during Hurricane Katrina, but the water receded before it could do any damage.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Metsi a tshologelela kwa ntle ga nokana ya bophara ja100.
mt: 100 meters of fence was destroyed.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Motsamaisi wa Commons, Adam Cuerden, one a supa go sa itumelela ka lebaka la go phimolwa ga dilo dingwe fa a bua leba Wikinews kgwedi e e fitileng.
mt: Commons contributor Adam Cuerden, one of the most prolific Wikinews editors in the past month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Tota fela Wales o simolotse ka go re bolelela maaka. La ntlha a dira jaaka e kete se ke ka mabaka a semolao. Labobebedi, a itira jaaka e kete o re reeditse, fitlhela go phimolwa botaki ja gagwe.
mt: Wales is reported to have said "I'm not going to say anything."  The reason is unknown.  Later, he is reported to have said, "I'm not going to say anything, but I'm not going to say anything."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Matshwenyego a sechaba a dirile go re go dirwe maiteko a go kwala molawana o itebagantseng le tsa thobalano tse di mo webosaeteng e, e e nang le teseletso ya go anamisa didikadike tsa diteng ka go farologana.
mt: The government has announced that it will be implementing a new system of identification and registration of citizens, which will include biometric data.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Bontsi ja tiro e e dirilweng e ne e le ya dibuka, mme thulaganyo e kwaletswe go rotloetsa di ponatshegotsamagodimo a Sagittarius.
mt: The meteor was a fireball, and the meteor shower was the Geminids.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Maduo a setlhopha se neng se a solofetse a ka dirwa ke makhubu a magolo thata magareng ga bosagaripa jo bontsho mo loaping le losagaripa lo lo lefifi lwa molalatladi.
mt: The aircraft was being used for a promotional event for a major car manufacturer.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Fela jaaka ngwedi o na le kgatelelo mo lefatsheng, o dira makhubu, Milky Way le yone e dira kgatelelo kwa lesagareng la dinaleldi la Sagittarius.
mt: As the year progresses, the Milky Way and its neighboring constellations, Sagittarius, will be visible in the night sky.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Baitsaanepe ba boranyane ba kgonne go sweetsa go re bontsho bo ama bontsho jo bo bongwe, ka mokgwa o o tshwanang ka fa dilo di tse dingwe di bo amang ka teng.
mt: The researchers say the device can be used to detect a variety of substances, depending on the type of ink used.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Tiori ya re bontsi jwa bontsho go dikologa lesagaripana lwa dinaledi bo fitlhelwa go dikologa lesagaripa lwa dinaledi go dira e kete go a phatsima, se dirwa ke dikarolwana tse dinnye di le dintsi.
mt: A study of the effects of light exposure on the sleep-wake cycle found that exposure to light at night can disrupt the cycle, and that exposure to light in the morning can help reset it.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Dipego tsa thelebishine di bontsha mosi o mosweu o tswa mo dimeleng.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Baokamedi ba lefelo ba tlhagisa banni ba ba gaufi le semela go nna mo mantlong, go tima difetlha phefo tsa mantlo, le go re ba seka ba nwa metsi a pompo.
mt: Residents were evacuated, windows were broken and water was poured in to put out the fire.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Go ya ka baemedi ba tsa magala a fetlhang motlakase ba Japan, go fitlhetswe marang a ditshitswana tsa caesium le iodine kwa madirelong.
mt: According to local media, residents of the Fukushima prefecture are being given potassium iodide tablets.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Balaodi ba fopholetsa gore seno se bontsha gore ditanka tse di tsentseng leokwane la yuraniamo mo lefelong di ka tswa di phatlogile mme di a dutla.
mt: Officials say the plane was carrying a large amount of cash, which was scattered and burned.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Mofuta wa kgotholo e tona Tuberculosis e esa alafegeng bonolo (XDR-TB), o bonwe lwa ntlha keNgaka Tony Moll mo lefelong la KwaZulu-Natal, ko Afrika Borwa.
mt: 2007 saw the first reported case of extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the world, in a patient named Tony Moll in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Mo potsolotsong, o ne a re mofuta o mosha o "o tshosa tota ka ntha ya palo e e kwa godimo ya dintsho tse o di bakang."
mt: In his statement, he said the "the aircraft was flying at a height of about 1,000 feet."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Dr. Moll o a akanya go re bangwe ba balwetse ba ka tswa ba tsenwe ke mogare o o kwa bookelong, e bile batho ba le ba bedi kgotsa go feta, ba ne ba le badiri ba tsa kalafi kwa bookelong.
mt: Dr. Moll said some of the patients were taken to the hospital, while others were treated on site, and that some of the injured were taken to the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
